name: Traffic Driving In Sky: Real Truck Flying Simulation Game 3D
name_original: Traffic Driving In Sky: Real Truck Flying Simulation Game 3D
description:
Tired of classic car simulators? Want to fly your turbo Truck,Turbo Police car , Turbo Formula one car like an airplane? This game is for you! Fly around the world travel beautiful landscapes be the best pilot.

[Game Features]
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Realistic and dynamic car physics
• Beautiful Landscapes
• Easy to Play
• Free to Play

This game is for you! You can test your airplane skills and car driving ability at the same time. Fly your vehicles around the world discover new landscapes, Drive your truck do stunts and drifts ! burn the asphalt road ! be the best truck driver!
You are free in a world that you can do what you want.
Install now and feel the best airplane flight experience!
